TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit ContextMenuService extends System.Object
public ref class ContextMenuService abstract sealed
.class public auto ansi abstract sealed ContextMenuService extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供用于显示 的系统实现。

span.span: Provides the system implementation for displaying a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供附加属性，这些属性可用于指定上下文菜单的外观和位置。The class provides attached properties that can be used to specify the appearance and position of a context menu. 类中的许多属性 还由定义 。Many of the properties in the class are also defined by the . 有时通过使用类来设置属性 比在上设置属性更方便 。Sometimes it is more convenient to set the properties by using the class than by setting the properties on a . 例如，你可以创建一个 由多个元素共享的，但使用 类为每个元素指定的位置不同 。For example, you can create a to be shared by multiple elements, but use the class to specify a different position of the for each element. 以下属性由 和 类定义。The following properties are defined by the and classes. 如果在和上都设置了这些属性中的任何一个 ，则使用中的属性值 。If any of these properties are set on both and the , the property value from the is used. - - - - - - 你还可以使用 来显示禁用项的菜单。You can also use the to display menus on disabled items. ## Examples 下面的示例将相同的赋 给两个按钮，并设置 、 、、 和属性， 以将 每个按钮的位置设置为不同的位置。The following example assigns the same to two buttons and sets the , , , , and properties to set the to different positions for each button. [!code-xaml[ContextMenuService_snip#SharedContextMenu](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContextMenuService_snip/CSharp/Pane1.xaml#sharedcontextmenu)] 下面的示例演示如何使用服务 在禁用的按钮上显示。The following example shows how to use the service to display a on a disabled button. 请注意，在作为 上下文菜单父级的按钮上设置属性。Notice that you set the property on the button that is the parent of the context menu. [!code-xaml[ContextMenu#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContextMenu/CSharp/Pane1.xaml#3)]

summary.span: 获取或设置指示 是否已启用投影效果的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the has the drop shadow effect enabled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 打开时，值设置为的值 。When the opens, the value is set to the value of . 如果属性为，则将此属性设置为 `true` 不起作用 `false` 。Setting this property to `true` has no effect if the property is `false`. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例将相同的赋 给两个按钮，并设置 、 、、 和属性， 以将 每个按钮的位置设置为不同的位置。The following example assigns the same to two buttons and sets the , , , , and properties to set the to different positions for each button. [!code-xml[ContextMenuService_snip#SharedContextMenu](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContextMenuService_snip/CSharp/Pane1.xaml#sharedcontextmenu)]

summary.span: 标识 附加属性。

span.span: Identifies the attached property.

summary.span: 获取或设置指示沿 x 方向相对于父控件放置 的位置的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates where along the x-direction to place the with respect to the parent control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过设置、、、 和 属性，可以定位。You can position a by setting the , , , , and properties. 这些属性的行为与对的行为相同 。These properties behave the same as they do for a . 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Popup 放置行为](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior)。For more information, see [Popup Placement Behavior](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior). ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` - or - ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *double**double* 值的字符串表示形式 。A string representation of a value. 这会被解释为 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] 度量值。This is interpreted as a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] measurement. 字符串不需要显式包含小数点。Strings need not explicitly include decimal points. 例如，的值 `1` 是可接受的。For instance a value of `1` is acceptable. *qualifiedDouble**qualifiedDouble* 如上所述的 *双精度* 值，后跟以下单元声明字符串之一： `px` 、 `in` 、 `cm` 和 `pt` 。A *double* value as described above, followed by one of the following unit declaration strings: `px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`. `px` (默认) 为 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]`px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] `in` 为英寸;1in = = 96px`in` is inches; 1in==96px `cm` 为厘米;1cm = = (96/2.54) px`cm` is centimeters; 1cm==(96/2.54) px `pt` 为点;1pt = = (96/72) px`pt` is points; 1pt==(96/72) px ## Examples 下面的示例将相同的赋 给两个按钮，并设置 、 、、 和属性， 以将 每个按钮的位置设置为不同的位置。The following example assigns the same to two buttons and sets the , , , , and properties to set the to different positions for each button. [!code-xml[ContextMenuService_snip#SharedContextMenu](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContextMenuService_snip/CSharp/Pane1.xaml#sharedcontextmenu)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性为时，如果 `false` 用户右键单击父控件，则不会显示上下文菜单。When the property is `false` the context menu does not appear when the user right-clicks the parent control. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何通过将属性设置为 false 来禁用上下文菜单 。The following example shows how to disable a context menu by setting the property to false. [!code-xml[ContextMenuService_snip#ContextMenuServiceIsEnabled](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContextMenuService_snip/CSharp/Pane1.xaml#contextmenuserviceisenabled)]

summary.span: 获取或设置指示沿 y 方向相对于父控件放置 的位置的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates where along the y-direction to place the with respect to the parent control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过设置、、、 和 属性，可以定位。You can position a by setting the , , , , and properties. 这些属性的行为与对的行为相同 。These properties behave the same as they do for a . 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Popup 放置行为](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior)。For more information, see [Popup Placement Behavior](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior). ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` - or - ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *double**double* 值的字符串表示形式 。A string representation of a value. 这会被解释为 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] 度量值。This is interpreted as a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] measurement. 字符串不需要显式包含小数点。Strings need not explicitly include decimal points. 例如，的值 `1` 是可接受的。For instance a value of `1` is acceptable. *qualifiedDouble**qualifiedDouble* 如上所述的 *双精度* 值，后跟以下单元声明字符串之一： `px` 、 `in` 、 `cm` 和 `pt` 。A *double* value as described above, followed by one of the following unit declaration strings: `px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`. `px` (默认) 为 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]`px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] `in` 为英寸;1in = = 96px`in` is inches; 1in==96px `cm` 为厘米;1cm = = (96/2.54) px`cm` is centimeters; 1cm==(96/2.54) px `pt` 为点;1pt = = (96/72) px`pt` is points; 1pt==(96/72) px ## Examples 下面的示例将相同的赋 给两个按钮，并设置 、 、、 和属性， 以将 每个按钮的位置设置为不同的位置。The following example assigns the same to two buttons and sets the , , , , and properties to set the to different positions for each button. [!code-xml[ContextMenuService_snip#SharedContextMenu](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContextMenuService_snip/CSharp/Pane1.xaml#sharedcontextmenu)]
